DOC.brief_summary: CART-19 cells has emerged as a powerful targeted immunotherapy, showing striking responses in highly refractory CD19+ acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL). This study aims to assess the safety and toxicity of CART-19 cells to patients who are refractory or at highest risk of relapse as defined by MRD+ status.
DOC.brief_title: CART-19 Cells For MRD Positive CD19+ ALL
DOC.criteria: Signed written informed consent Aged between 160 years Patients with MRD positive CD19+ ALL Cardiac: Left ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 50% Adequate renal and hepatic function Performance status: Karnofsky ≥ 70% Pregnant or lactating females. Any comorbidity precluding the administration of CART19 cells.
